mapper.select: SELECT tbs.box_standard, tbs.create_by, tbs.create_time, tbs.update_by, tbs.update_time, tbs.version, tbs.del_flag, tbs.remark, tbs.id, tbs.box_standard, tbs.box_unit_price, tbs.sort_no, COUNT(tbi.id) total_number, SUM(tbi.is_used) use_number, (COUNT(tbi.id) - SUM(tbi.is_used)) inventory_number, CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(tbi.is_used) / COUNT(tbi.id), 2), '%') use_ratio FROM t_box_standard tbs INNER JOIN t_box_info tbi ON tbs.box_standard = tbi.box_standard WHERE tbs.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY tbs.box_standard
SELECT id, box_standard boxStandard, box_unit_price boxUnitPrice FROM t_box_standard WHERE del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_box_standard (box_standard, box_unit_price, remark, sort_no, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, version, del_flag) VALUES (#{boxStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boxUnitPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into t_box_standard
box_standard,
box_unit_price,
remark,
sort_no,
create_time,
create_by,
update_time,
update_by,
version,
del_flag,

mapper.update:
update t_box_standard
box_standard = #{boxStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
box_unit_price = #{boxUnitPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort_no = #{sortNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

UPDATE t_box_standard SET box_standard = #{boxStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, box_unit_price = #{boxUnitPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_no = #{sortNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
